DOC.brief_summary: Studies animal show beta2-adrenoceptor activation selective agonist regulate protein metabolism muscle growth skeletal cardiac muscle tissue . These effect may mediate cAMP/PKA dependent activation several downstream site modulate protein synthesis breakdown . While role beta2-adrenoceptor signal well-described animal , inadequately explored human . The purpose study thus investigate effect chronic beta2-adrenergic stimulation ( cAMP/PKA-signaling ) muscle hypertrophy .
DOC.brief_title: Chronic Beta2-adrenergic Stimulation Cardiac Skeletal Muscle Hypertrophy
DOC.criteria: Physical active Nonsmokers Nonasthmatics No chronic disease Informed consent Smoker Allergy towards study drug
